description: vessel has three small feet; flat bottom with very slightly inward-tapering sides in roughly cylindrical shape; domed cover with tall U-shaped knob; white clay with brown, metallic grey and black; U-shaped motifs on vessel; rounded design with vent holes on cover
marks: Signature and Sticker on bottom, incised: [(Mutsuo)]
